content.rendered:
Last February, Big Ferro had the great honour to be a part of something special.

On the occasion of the upcoming opening of the brand new Queen’s Diamond Jubilee Galleries, running 70 ft above the Abbey floor, right under the lace-like intricacies of Westminster Abbey’s ceilings, our team of master welders has fabricated the cores of the new timber covered staircase balustrades, running all the way up to the beautiful chambers hosting a one-of-a-kind collection of treasures, that remained hidden to the public for 700 years!

Our top notch standards in fabrication, the quality of the material we choose for all our project, the attention to every little detail, from the perfectly smooth welding points, to the flawless joint components, convinced the main contractors of this majestic endeavour to pick Big Ferro among all others.

So come and discover what we can do for you, scroll the galleries to take a look at our projects and get in touch with us, through our 24hours LiveChat service, via email or calling the 02089642857.

We offer high standards, professionalism and flexibility, to meet and exceed your expectations!
